title: How to Craft the Big Element in Little Alchemy 2: Gameplay Guide

steps.title: Combine Philosophy with several elements to get Big.
steps.content: Combine Philosophy with several elements to get Big. To get the element Big, you'll need the element Philosophy , which is made by combining Human with Story or Idea or Chicken with Egg . [1] X Research source You'll also need one of the following elements to combine with Philosophy: [2] X Research source Universe Galaxy Galaxy Cluster Solar System Sun Planet

steps.title: Using Time.
steps.content: Using Time. Time is an element you unlock after unlocking 100 other elements. You can use Time while creating Big in the path listed below: Earth + Earth = Land Land + Land = Continent Continent + Continent = Planet Water + Earth = Mud Air + Air = Pressure Earth + Pressure = Stone Mud + Stone = Clay Water + Water = Puddle Puddle + Puddle = Pond Pond + Pond = Lake Lake + Lake = Sea Earth + Sea = Primordial Soup Primordial Soup + Time = Life Clay + Life = Human Stone + Air = Sand Sand + Fire = Glass Planet + Fire = Sun Fire + Fire = Energy Sun + Energy = Solar Cell Solar Cell + Sun = Electricity Glass + Electricity = Light Bulb Human + Light Bulb = Idea Human + Idea = Philosophy Planet + Philosophy = Big

steps.title: Without using Time.
steps.content: Without using Time. If you don't have Time unlocked, you can still make Big. The path will just be slightly different, as listed below: Earth + Earth = Land Land + Land = Continent Continent + Continent = Planet Water + Earth = Mud Air + Air = Pressure Earth + Pressure = Stone Mud + Stone = Clay Water + Water = Puddle Puddle + Puddle = Pond Pond + Pond = Lake Lake + Lake = Sea Earth + Sea = Primordial Soup Fire + Fire = Energy Primordial Soup + Energy = Life Clay + Life = Human Stone + Air = Sand Sand + Fire = Glass Planet + Fire = Sun Sun + Energy = Solar Cell Solar Cell + Sun = Electricity Glass + Electricity = Light Bulb Human + Light Bulb = Idea Human + Idea = Philosophy Planet + Philosophy = Big

steps.title: Many recipes use Big.
steps.content: Many recipes use Big. Some of these recipes require the Myths and Monsters DLC, which will be noted in the list below: Atomic Bomb: Explosion + Big Aviary: Birdcage + Big Blizzard: Snow + Big Boulder: Rock or Stone + Big Bus: Car + Big Circus: Tent + Big City: Village + Big Clock: Watch + Big Continent: Land + Big Dinosaur: Lizard + Big Duck: Duckling + Big Excavator: Shovel + Big Flood: Rain + Big Hill: Boulder + Big Jupiter: Planet or Saturn + Big Lake: Pond + Big Land: Soil + Big Legend: Story or Fairy Tale + Big Lion: Cat + Big Mercury: Pluto + Big Mountain: Hill or Earth + Big Ocean: Sea + Big Ostrich: Bird + Big Paraglider: Kite + Big Plant: Grass + Big Pond: Puddle + Big Rat: Mouse + Big River: Stream + Big Rock: Pebble + Big Sea: Lake + Big Skyscraper: House + Big Stream: Rivulet + Big Sun: Proxima Centauri + Big Swimming Pool: Aquarium + Big Tornado: Wind + Big Tree: Plant + Big Vault: Safe + Big Elf (DLC): Faerie (DLC) + Big Giant (DLC): Monster (DLC) or Deity (DLC) + Big Jormungandr (DLC): Ouroboros (DLC) + Big Orc (DLC): Goblin (DLC) + Big Ziz (DLC): Phoenix or Griffin (DLC) + Big
